file_content.text: Sir, I don't mean to question orders, but, uh... do we really need to be here?
I mean, suppose we leave. The Empire wins a giant ice cube. Big deal.
You're missing the big picture, son.
Those are our ships crashed out there. With our secrets. If we don't salvage them, the Imperials will.
And besides, do you really want to give the Empire the satisfaction of seeing us turn tail and run?
